{ 0xAF000003, 0x00000000, 0x00000011, 0x00000001 } - Keep Biggest Blob
{ 0xAF000003, 0x00000000, 0x00000011, 0x00000002 } - Find Biggest Blob
{ 0xAF000003, 0x00000000, 0x00000011, 0x00000003 } - Filter Blobs By Size
{ 0xAF000003, 0x00000000, 0x00000011, 0x00000004 } - Fill Holes
{ 0xAF000003, 0x00000000, 0x00000011, 0x00000005 } - Find Blobs By Size (deprecated)
{ 0xAF000003, 0x00000000, 0x00000011, 0x00000006 } - Filter Circle Blobs
{ 0xAF000003, 0x00000000, 0x00000011, 0x00000007 } - Filter Quadrilateral Blobs
